sentences: Albertus Petrus Enricus Gerardus Westelaken (2 September 1949 â€“ 4 June 2015), better known by his stage name Albert West, was a Dutch pop singer and record producer.
He was the lead singer of The Shuffles from 1963 to 1973.
He was born in 's-Hertogenbosch, North Brabant.
(selective, charting in Nationale Hitparade LP Top 20, 30, 50) now known as Album Top 100 in the Netherlands)
Albert worked on re-recordings of Brian Hyland material (USA) in 1988.
